title: PayDay 2 community erupts in anger at addition of stat-changing microtransactions
text:
PayDay 2 community erupts in anger at addition of stat-changing microtransactions 
Published By: Eurogamer.net - Today 
Furious PayDay 2 players have blasted developer Overkill for adding a microtransaction system to get random loot with gameplay-changing effe...
